title: Occupational health & safety act of Victoria
brief_description: A program to explain how the Safety Act relates to the workplace of Victoria. Part 1. Introduction and outline of respective duties of employers manufactures and employees and roles of the Department of Labour. Victorian Occupational Health and Safety Commission and occupational health and safety representatives. Part 2. Looks at keys to success with consultative arrangements for resolving workplace issues. Part 3. Outlines ways problems can be resolved.
